titles.title: Jesus put this song into our hearts

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
1. Jesus put this song into our hearts, (x2)
It's a song of joy no one can take away,
Jesus put this song, into our hearts.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
2. Jesus taught us how to live in harmony, (x2)
Different faces, different races, He made us one,
Jesus taught us how to live, in harmony.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
3. Jesus taught us how to be a family, (x2)
Loving one another with the love that He gives,
Jesus taught us how to be, a family.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
4. Jesus turned our sorrow into dancing, (x2)
Changed our tears of sadness into rivers of joy,
Jesus turned our sorrow, into a dance.
